# NETWORK::NETWORK_FADE_IN_ENTITY

## Summary
Fades in the entity with flash

## Parameters
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity
* **BOOL** network: If true, the fade will be networked and appear on other machines
* **BOOL** flash = true

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
state - 0 does 5 fades
state - 1 does 6 fades

p3: setting to 1 made vehicle fade in slower, probably "slow" as per NETWORK_FADE_OUT_ENTITY
